text: Dariush Farhang (Persian: داریوش فرهنگ , November 28, 1947 Abadan) is an Iranian Movie director,screenwriter and Actor. In 1963, he graduated from the Faculty of Fine Arts, University of Tehran, majoring in theater directing.In 1981,He started his career in cinema by writing screenplays and directing Movies. ==References== * Category:Iranian actors Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian movie directors Category:Iranian screenwriters
title: Dariush Farhang
